name: Billionaires Leaving Earth
description: From the perspective of us, the poor and the working class people on Earth,  it appears that the richest people on the planet are running away to space, planning for when the end of the world comes, so they can still live and the rest of us die. It feels as if they know that the planet is about to be unlivable, when they have the power to do something about it. Or perhaps, I am just overreacting, that there's not all a hidden agenda, that billionaires cannot simply "read the room".
